alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Lee; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Chickasaw, southeastern Pontotoc and southwestern Lee Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Furrs, or near Verona, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Verona, Trace State Park, Plantersville, Troy, Furrs, Houlka, New Houlka, Chiwapa, Van Vleet, Parkersburg, Palmetto, Bissell, Thelma, Chesterville, Old Union, Wallfield and George P Cossar State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
